author: Alex Michaelides
review: A gripping psychological thriller that keeps you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A mesmerizing tale of magic, love, and destiny set within the enchanting world of a mysterious circus.

author: Tara Westover
review: A remarkable memoir of resilience and self-discovery, recounting the author's journey from an isolated upbringing to higher education.

author: Andy Weir
review: A thrilling sci-fi adventure that blends humor, suspense, and scientific accuracy as an astronaut fights for survival on Mars.

author: Gillian Flynn
review: A twisted and darkly suspenseful thriller that keeps readers guessing until the shocking conclusion.

author: Paulo Coelho
review: A profound and inspirational tale about following your dreams and the journey of self-discovery.

author: Donna Tartt
review: An epic coming-of-age story that explores themes of loss, art, and redemption, set against the backdrop of the New York art world.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: A delightful and adventurous tale of Bilbo Baggins' journey to reclaim treasure guarded by the dragon Smaug.

author: Paula Hawkins
review: A gripping psychological thriller that delves into the complexities of memory, obsession, and deception.
